Springfield.J.E. King Manufacturing Company: J.E. King Manufacturing Company, also known as the Long-King Furniture, Cloud Furniture Manufacturing, and Springfield Seed Company, is a historic daylight factory building located at Springfield, Greene County, Missouri. It was built in 1922, and expanded in the 1930s and 1940s. It is a two-story, "L"-shaped red brick building with a Streamline Moderne Style-influenced glass block storefront at first floor level.
